Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value: $COMMENT="WARNING: THIS IS AN ADVANCED TEMPLATE" $COMMENT="DO NOT MODIFY UNLESS YOU ARE AN" $COMMENT="ADVANCED USER!" %PI=" "% %if easlRequired == "T"% $EASL = %EASL_INIT(classGUID)% %endIf% %NamespaceDeclaration% %NamespaceBody% %EASL_END()%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="WARNING: THIS IS AN ADVANCED TEMPLATE" $COMMENT="DO NOT MODIFY UNLESS YOU ARE AN" $COMMENT="ADVANCED USER!" %if packageHasGenClasses != "T"% %list="Namespace" @separator="

" @indent=""% %endTemplate%
%if packagePath == "" or genOptCSGenNamespace != "T"% %PI="

"% %list="Namespace" @separator="

" @indent=""% %list="Class" @separator="

" @indent=""% %endTemplate%
{ %PI="

"% %list="Namespace" @separator="

" @indent="	"% %list="Class" @separator="

" @indent="	"% }//end namespace %packageName%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="WARNING: THIS IS AN ADVANCED TEMPLATE" $COMMENT="DO NOT MODIFY UNLESS YOU ARE AN" $COMMENT="ADVANCED USER!" %if packagePath == "" or genOptCSGenNamespace != "T" or packageHasGenClasses != "T"% %endTemplate%
$name = %packagePath% %if packageIsFirstNonEmpty != "T"% $name = %packageName% %endIf% namespace $name

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
$bases=%ClassInherits% %if $bases != ""% $bases=" "+$bases %endIf% $generic = %list="ClassParameter" @separator=","% %if $generic != ""% $generic = "<" + $generic + ">" %endIf% $genericConstraints = %list="ClassParameterConstraint" @separator="\n\t"% $genericConstraintsTag = %classTag:"genericConstraints"% %if $genericConstraintsTag != ""% $genericConstraints = $genericConstraints + " " + $genericConstraintsTag %endIf%
%if classTag:"Attribute" != ""% %REPLACE(classTag:"Attribute", ";", "\n")% %endIf% %PI=" "% %if elemType == "Interface"% %classTag:"unsafe"=="true" ? "unsafe" : ""% %CONVERT_SCOPE(classScope)% %classTag:"new"=="true" ? "new" : ""% %classTag:"partial"=="true" ? "partial"% %PI=""% interface %className%$generic$bases $genericConstraints %endTemplate%
%classTag:"unsafe"=="true" ? "unsafe" : ""% %CONVERT_SCOPE(classScope)% %classTag:"new"=="true" ? "new" : ""% %classAbstract=="T" ? "abstract" : ""% %classIsLeaf=="T" ? "sealed" : ""% %classTag:"static"=="true" ? "static"% %classTag:"partial"=="true" ? "partial"% %PI=""%
%if genOptStmCSharpUseNewTemplate == "T" and stmContextHasStatemachine == "T"% %if $bases == ""% $bases = " : StateMachineContext" %else% $bases = $bases + ", StateMachineContext" %endIf% %endIf%
class %className%$generic$bases %if $genericConstraints !=""% \n\t$genericConstraints %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$type=%linkAttQualName%
%if linkAttCollectionClass != "" and linkCard != "" and linkCard != "0" and linkCard != "0..1" and linkCard != "1"% $type=%linkAttCollectionClass% %elseIf linkIsBound == "T"% $type = $type + "<" + %linkParamSubs% + ">" %endIf%
%PI=" "% %CONVERT_SCOPE(linkAttAccess)% %linkAttTargetScope=="classifier" ? "static" : ""% $type %PI=""%
%if linkAttRole != ""% %linkAttRole%; %else% %REPLACE(genOptDefaultAssocAttName,"$LinkClass",linkAttName)%; %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$templateName = "Import" $debugMessage = "Begin" %DebugMessage($templateName, $debugMessage)% %DebugMessage($templateName, $debugMessage)% $debugMessage = "importClassName = "+%importClassName%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFileName = "+%importFileName%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFilePath = "+%importFilePath%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFromAggregation = "+%importFromAggregation%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFromAssociation = "+%importFromAssociation%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFromAtt = "+%importFromAtt%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFromDependency = "+%importFromDependency%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFromGeneralization = "+%importFromGeneralization%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFromMeth = "+%importFromMeth%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFromParam = "+%importFromParam%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFromRealization = "+%importFromRealization%+"
" $debugMessage += "importFromTemplateBinding = "+%importFromTemplateBinding%+"
" $debugMessage += "importInFile = "+%importInFile%+"
" $debugMessage += "importPackagePath = "+%importPackagePath%+"
" $debugMessage += "ImportRelativeFilePath = "+%ImportRelativeFilePath%+"
" %DebugMessage($templateName, $debugMessage)% %if importInFile=="T" or importPackagePath==""% // preparing to end %DebugMessage($templateName, importPackagePath)% %if importFromAssociation=="T"% // importFromAssociation %endIf% // ending %endTemplate% %DebugMessage($templateName, importPackagePath)% using %importPackagePath%; $debugMessage = "End" %DebugMessage($templateName, $debugMessage)%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$templateName = "Import Section" $debugMessage = "Begin" %DebugMessage($templateName, $debugMessage)% $COMMENT="WARNING: THIS IS AN ADVANCED TEMPLATE" $COMMENT="DO NOT MODIFY UNLESS YOU ARE AN" $COMMENT="ADVANCED USER!" $imports = %fileImports% + "
" // fileImports = %fileImports% $imports += %fileHeaders% + "
" $imports += %list="Import" @separator="
" importFromAggregation=="T" or importFromAssociation=="T" or importFromAtt=="T" or importFromDependency=="T" or importFromGeneralization=="T" or importFromMeth=="T" or importFromParam=="T" or importFromRealization=="T"% %REMOVE_DUPLICATES($imports, "
")% $debugMessage = "End" %DebugMessage($templateName, $debugMessage)%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if attTag:"Attribute" != ""% %REPLACE(attTag:"Attribute", ";", "\n")% %endIf%
%if classStereotype == "enumeration"% %PI=""% %attName% %attInitial ? " = " value% %endTemplate%
%PI=" "% %CONVERT_SCOPE(attScope)% %attStatic=="T" ? "static" : ""% %attConst=="T" ? "readonly" : ""% %attVolatile=="T" ? "volatile" : ""% %attTag:"const" ? "const" : ""% %attTag:"fixed" ? "fixed" : ""% %RESOLVE_QUALIFIED_TYPE(".", "int")%
%if attTag:"fixed"=="true"% %PI=""% %attName% %if attCollection == "T" and attContainerType != ""% %attContainerType% %endIf% %else% %if attCollection == "T" and attContainerType != ""% %attContainerType% %endIf% %PI=""% %attName% %endIf%
%attInitial ? " = " value%
%PI=""% %if attStereotype == "property"% $Value = %attTag:"Automatic" ? value% %if attTag:"readonly"=="true"% {%attTag:"GetScope"% get;} %elseIf attTag:"writeonly"=="true"% {%attTag:"SetScope"% set;} %else% {%attTag:"GetScope"% get; %attTag:"SetScope"% set;} %endIf% %endTemplate% ;

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
/* JJH: C#: Operation Declaration: Begin */
 $sName = "~" + %className% %if opName == $sName% %if opTag:"Attribute" != ""% %REPLACE(opTag:"Attribute", ";", "
")% %endIf% %PI=" "% %opTag:"extern"=="true" ? "extern" : ""% %opName%() %endTemplate%
%if elemType == "Interface"% %if opTag:"Attribute" != ""% %REPLACE(opTag:"Attribute", ";", "
")% %endIf% %PI=" "% %opTag:"unsafe"=="true" ? "unsafe" : ""% %opTag:"new"=="true" ? "new" : ""% %opTag:"extern"=="true" ? "extern" : ""% %opTag:"delegate"=="true" ? "delegate" : ""% %if opReturnArray=="T"% $array = %opTag:"array" ? value : "[]"% %endIf% %RESOLVE_QUALIFIED_TYPE(".", "int")%$array %opStereotype=="operator" ? "operator" : ""% %PI=""% %opName% %opTag:"generic"% (%list="Parameter" @separator=", "%) %opTag:"genericConstraints"% %endTemplate%
%if opTag:"Attribute" != ""% %REPLACE(opTag:"Attribute", ";", "
")% %endIf% %PI=" "% %opTag:"unsafe"=="true" ? "unsafe" : ""% %if opName == className and opStatic == "T"%
%elseIf opTag:"Implements" == ""% %CONVERT_SCOPE(opScope)% %elseIf opTag:"ImplementsExplicit" != "true"% public %endIf% %opTag:"new"=="true" ? "new" : ""% %opAbstract=="T" ? "abstract" : ""% %opTag:"sealed"=="true" ? "sealed" : ""% %opStatic=="T" ? "static" : ""% %opTag:"extern"=="true" ? "extern" : ""% %opTag:"delegate"=="true" ? "delegate" : ""% %opTag:"override"=="true" ? "override" : ""% %opTag:"virtual"=="true" ? "virtual" : ""% %opTag:"async"=="true" ? "async" : ""% $type = "void" %if opReturnType != ""% /* JJH: C#: Operation Declaration: opReturnType = "%opReturnType%" */
 $type = %RESOLVE_QUALIFIED_TYPE(".", "int")% %endIf% %if opName == className% $type = "" %endIf% %if opReturnArray=="T"% $array = %opTag:"array" ? value : "[]"% %endIf% $type$array %opStereotype=="operator" ? "operator" : ""% %PI=""% %if opTag:"Implements" != "" and opTag:"ImplementsExplicit" == "true"% %opTag:"Implements"% %else% %RESOLVE_OP_NAME()% %endIf% %opTag:"generic"% (%list="Parameter" @separator=", "%) %opTag:"initializer" ? ": " value% %opTag:"genericConstraints"% /* JJH: C#: Operation Declaration: End */

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
/* JJH: Action:Begin */\n
$GUID = $parameter1 /* JJH: Action: GUID = $GUID /*\n %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$jjhActionName = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Name")% /* JJH: Action: Action Name = $jjhActionName */\n
$kind = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Kind")% /* JJH: Action: kind = $kind */\n
%if $kind == "Opaque"% %ActionOpaque($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "Call"% %ActionCall($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "If"% %ActionIf($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "Switch"% %ActionSwitch($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "Loop"% %ActionLoop($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "LoopWhile"% %ActionLoop($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "LoopDoWhile"% %ActionLoopDo($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "Parallel"% %ActionParallel($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "Create"% %ActionCreate($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "Destroy"% %ActionDestroy($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "Break"% %ActionBreak($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "RaiseEvent"% %ActionRaiseEvent($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "RaiseException"% %ActionRaiseException($GUID)%
%elseIf $kind == "Assignment"% %ActionAssignment($GUID)%
%endIf%
/* JJH: Action:End */\n

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 $list = $parameter2
%if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$index = "0"
%if $list==""% $list = %EASL_GET("Collection", $GUID, "SubActions")% %endIf%
$count = %EASL_GET("Count", $list)% %if $count=="" or $count == $index% %endTemplate%
$COMMENT = "Get the indexed guarded child action" $guardedAction = %EASL_GET("At", $list, $index)%
$kind = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Kind")% %if $kind != "Guarded"% $kind\n\n %endTemplate%
$guard = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Guard")% $expression = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Expression")% %if $expression != ""% if ($expression)\n {\n $TAB = "\t" %endIf%
%EASLList="Action" @separator="\n" @indent="\t" @owner=$guardedAction @collection="SubActions"% $TAB break; // break condition encountered...
%if $expression != ""% \n }\n %endIf%
$COMMENT = "Get the next indexed guarded child action" $index = %MATH_ADD($index, "1")% %ActionIf($GUID, $list, $index)%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $EQ = "="
$GUID = $parameter1 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$sActionName = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Name")% /* JJH: Action Call: sActionName = $sActionName */\n
$context = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Context")% $contextClassifier = %EASL_GET("Property", $context, "Classifier")%
$behavior = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Behavior")% /* JJH: Action Call: behavior = $behavior */\n $arguments = %EASLList="CallArgument" @separator="," @owner=$GUID @collection="Arguments"%
$target = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Pin", "Target")% /* JJH: Action Call: target = $target */\n
$sUMLType = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "UMLType")% /* JJH: Action Call: UMLType = $sUMLType */\n $BehParent = %EASL_GET("Property", $behavior, "Parent")%
$sBehName = %EASL_GET("Property", $behavior, "Name")% /* JJH: Action Call: behaviorName = $sBehName */\n %if $sBehName == ""% /*Warning: $sActionName - Associated behavior not found within the package!!*/ %endTemplate%
%if $sUMLType=="uml:CallBehaviorAction" and $BehParent != "" and $BehParent != classGUID% /*Warning: $sBehName - Invoking behaviors from other classes - Not Supported!!*/ %endTemplate%
%if $sUMLType=="uml:CallOperationAction" and $BehParent != "" and $BehParent != classGUID and $target==""% /*Warning: $sBehName - Invoking operations from other classes requires a "target" pin to be configured!!*/ %endTemplate%
%if $target != "" and $BehParent != classGUID% $sPropName = %EASL_GET("Property", $target, "Name")% %else% $sPropName = %EASL_GET("Property", $context, "Name")% %endIf%
$Result = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Pin", "Result")% $sResultName = %EASL_GET("Property",$Result,"Name")% %if $sResultName != ""% $sResultName $EQ %endIf%
%if $sPropName != ""% $sPropName. %endIf%
$sBehName($arguments);

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$sActionName = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Name")%
$sUMLType = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "UMLType")%
%if $sUMLType=="uml:DestroyObjectAction"% $target = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Pin", "Target")% %if $target == ""% /*Warning: $sActionName - Target Pin Not Found!*/ %endTemplate% $sObjectName = %EASL_GET("Property", $target, "Name")% %else% $context = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Context")% %if $context ==""% /*Warning: $sActionName - Context object not found!*/ %endTemplate% $sObjectName = %EASL_GET("Property", $context, "Name")% %endIf%
$sObjectName = null;

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 $list = $parameter2 $index = $parameter3 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
%if $index==""% $index = "0" %endIf%
%if $list==""% $list = %EASL_GET("Collection", $GUID, "SubActions")% %endIf%
$count = %EASL_GET("Count", $list)% %if $count=="" or $count == $index% %endTemplate%
$COMMENT = "Get the indexed guarded child action" $guardedAction = %EASL_GET("At", $list, $index)%
$kind = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Kind")% %if $kind != "Guarded"% $kind

 %endTemplate%
$guard = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Guard")% $expression = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Expression")% %if $index == "0"% if ($expression)
 %elseIf $expression != "" and $expression != "else"% else if ($expression)
 %else% else
 %endIf%
{
 %EASLList="Action" @separator="
" @indent="	" @owner=$guardedAction @collection="SubActions"%
 }
$COMMENT = "Get the next indexed guarded child action" $index = %MATH_ADD($index, "1")% %if $index != $count% 
 %endIf% %ActionIf($GUID, $list, $index)%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$COMMENT = "Get the first guarded child action - representing the iteration" $list = %EASL_GET("Collection", $GUID, "SubActions")% $guardedAction = %EASL_GET("At", $list, "0")%
$kind = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Kind")% %if $kind != "Guarded"% %endTemplate%
$guard = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Guard")% $expression = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Expression")% $upper = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Upper")% $lower = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Lower")%
%if $expression != ""% while ($expression)
 %elseIf $lower != ""% for ($lower; $upper; ;)
 %else% while (true)
 %endIf%
{
 %EASLList="Action" @separator="
" @indent="	" @owner=$guardedAction @collection="SubActions"%
 }

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 $list = $parameter2 $index = $parameter3 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
%if $index==""% $index = "0" %endIf%
%if $list==""% $list = %EASL_GET("Collection", $GUID, "SubActions")% %endIf%
$count = %EASL_GET("Count", $list)% %if $count=="" or $count == $index% %endTemplate%
$COMMENT = "Get the indexed guarded child action" $guardedAction = %EASL_GET("At", $list, $index)%
$kind = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Kind")% %if $kind != "Guarded"% $kind\n\n %endTemplate%
$guard = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Guard")% $expression = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Expression")%
%PI="\n"% $sSubActions = %EASLList="Action" @separator="\n" @indent="\t\t\t" @owner=$guardedAction @collection="SubActions"% $ThreadName = "thread" + $index %if $sSubActions != ""% System.Threading.Thread $ThreadName = new System.Threading.Thread( new System.Threading.ThreadStart( delegate() { $sSubActions } )); $ThreadName.Start(); %endIf%
$index = %MATH_ADD($index, "1")% %ActionParallel($GUID, $list, $index)%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate% $BehKind = %EASL_GET("Property",$GUID,"Kind")% $BehSpecification = %EASL_GET("Property",$GUID,"Specification")%
$COMMENT = "Operations are taken care already" %if $BehKind == "Operation"% %endTemplate%
$COMMENT = "Behavior is associated to another specification" %if $BehSpecification != ""% %endTemplate%
%BehaviorDeclaration($GUID)% %BehaviorBody($GUID)%

Column.name: Template
Template
Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 $sOption = $parameter2 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$EQ = "="
$TRANSITION_TYPE = "TransitionType" $STATE_TYPE = "StateType" $NEXT_STATE = "nextState" $CURR_STATE = "currState" $CURR_TRANSITION = "currTransition" $TRANSCEND_VAR = "transcend" $HISTORY_SUFFIX = "_history" $STATES_NOSTATE = "ST_NOSTATE" $STAY_IN_CURRENT_STATE_VAR = "bStayInCurrentState"
$bIsTriggered = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "IsTriggered")% $bHasEffect = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "HasEffect")% $bIsTranscend= %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "IsTranscend")% $Target = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Target")% $bIsFinal = %EASL_GET("Property", $Target, "IsFinalState")% $sGuardExpr = %EASLList="Guard" @separator=" && " @indent="\t" @owner=$GUID @collection="Guards"%
%if $sOption=="TriggeredGuarded"% %if $bIsTriggered=="false" or $sGuardExpr ==""% %endTemplate% %elseIf $sOption=="TriggeredUnGuarded"% %if $bIsTriggered=="false" or $sGuardExpr !=""% %endTemplate% %elseIf $sOption=="UnTriggeredGuarded"% %if $bIsTriggered=="true" or $sGuardExpr ==""% %endTemplate% %elseIf $sOption=="UnTriggeredUnGuarded"% %if $bIsTriggered=="true" or $sGuardExpr !=""% %endTemplate% %endIf%
%if $bIsFinal=="true"% $sTargetName = $STATES_NOSTATE + "/*Final State*/" %else% $sTargetName = %StateEnumeratedName($Target)% %endIf%
$Source = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Source")%
%if $Target == "" or $Source == ""% %endTemplate%
$bIsHistory = %EASL_GET("Property", $Target, "IsHistory")% %if $sGuardExpr!=""% $sGuardExpr = %TRIM($sGuardExpr)% %endIf%
$sTriggerExpr = %EASLList="Trigger" @separator=" && " @indent="\t" @owner=$GUID @collection="Triggers"% %PI="\n"% %if $bIsTriggered=="true" and $sTriggerExpr != ""% $sTriggerExpr = %TRIM($sTriggerExpr)% %endIf% $Tab="\t" %if $bIsTriggered=="true" and $sTriggerExpr != "" and $sGuardExpr != ""% else if($sTriggerExpr && $sGuardExpr) %elseIf $bIsTriggered=="true" and $sTriggerExpr != "" and $sGuardExpr == ""% else if($sTriggerExpr) %elseIf $sGuardExpr != ""% else if($sGuardExpr) %else% else if(true) %endIf% { $Tab$STAY_IN_CURRENT_STATE_VAR $EQ false; \n %if $bIsHistory == "true"% $TargetParent = %EASL_GET("Property", $Target, "Parent")% $sTargetHistory = %StateEnumeratedName($TargetParent)% + $HISTORY_SUFFIX $Tab$NEXT_STATE $EQ $sTargetHistory; %else% $Tab$NEXT_STATE $EQ $STATE_TYPE.$sTargetName; %endIf%
%if $bHasEffect == "true"% $sTransition=%StateEnumeratedName($GUID)% $Tab$CURR_TRANSITION $EQ $TRANSITION_TYPE.$sTransition; %endIf%
%if $bIsTranscend == "true"% $SourceParent = %EASL_GET("Property", $Source, "Parent")% $sSourceHistory = %StateEnumeratedName($SourceParent)% + $HISTORY_SUFFIX $Tab$TRANSCEND_VAR $EQ true; $Tab$sSourceHistory $EQ $CURR_STATE; %else% $Tab$TRANSCEND_VAR $EQ false; %endIf%
}

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT = "LoggingLevel and Severity use the following values" $COMMENT = "1 - Verbose" $COMMENT = "12 - Information" $COMMENT = "123 - Important" $COMMENT = "1234 - Warning" $COMMENT = "12345 - Critical" $COMMENT = "If the Severity of the message is equal or greater than the LoggingLevel, " $COMMENT = "the message will be displayed"
$templateName=$parameter1 $messageString=$parameter2
$severity=$parameter3 %if $severity == ""% $severity = "12" %endIf%
$debug = %EXEC_ADD_IN("EIIWEAAddIn", "GetVariableValue", "DEBUG")%
%if $debug == "true"% $loggingLevel = %EXEC_ADD_IN("EIIWEAAddIn", "GetVariableValue", "LoggingLevel")% $remainder = %TRIM_LEFT($loggingLevel, $severity)% %if $remainder == ""% /* EIIW: $templateName: $messageString */\n %endIf% %endIf%
